summary: Iteration 60: Tested Cloud Storage Integration feature - All backend APIs working (17/17 tests passed). Frontend UI working correctly with mode selection (Local/Cloud/Ambos), provider selection (Terabox/Google Drive/OneDrive/Dropbox), credentials form, and admin overview tab.

minor.issue: Returns 520 error when cloud provider not fully configured - should return 400 with clearer message

ui_bugs.issue: Minor: Email placeholder showed 'undefined' when no provider selected - FIXED in this iteration

critical_code_review_comments: Backend fix: GET /api/storage-config now merges stored config with defaults, preventing missing 'modo' field issue
Cloud provider authentication is MOCKED - stores credentials but doesn't actually authenticate with Google/Dropbox/OneDrive/Terabox APIs
context_for_next_testing_agent: Cloud Storage Integration tested in iteration 60. All APIs working: GET/PUT /api/storage-config, GET /api/storage-config/providers, POST /api/storage-config/connect/{provider}, GET /api/storage-config/admin/all, GET /api/storage-config/sync-status, POST /api/storage-config/sync-now. Frontend page at /armazenamento working correctly. IMPORTANT: Cloud provider connections are MOCKED - credentials are stored but real OAuth/API authentication not tested.

backend_apis.GET /api/storage-config: PASS - Returns config with defaults merged
backend_apis.PUT /api/storage-config: PASS - Updates storage mode and settings
backend_apis.GET /api/storage-config/admin/all: PASS - Returns all partners config (admin only)
backend_apis.POST /api/storage-config/sync-now: PASS - Triggers sync (local mode returns error as expected)
backend_apis.GET /api/storage-config/download: PASS - Download endpoint exists (520 without provider)

frontend_ui.provider_selection: PASS - 4 provider cards visible when cloud mode selected
frontend_ui.credentials_form: PASS - Email/Password fields and Conectar button visible
frontend_ui.admin_overview_tab: PASS - Shows all partners with mode/provider/status
frontend_ui.partner_selector: PASS - Admin can select partner to configure
frontend_ui.parceiro_view: PASS - No admin tabs/selector, only sees own config

mocked_integrations.note: Cloud provider authentication (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, Terabox) requires real OAuth credentials. Current implementation stores credentials but doesn't actually authenticate with cloud providers.
